feed.title: Moe Sani
feed.subtitle: Visionary engineer and innovator specializing in robotics, embedded systems, and machine learning. Leading edge AI deployment and building intelligent systems for real-world impact.

entry.title: Welcome to the Lab Notes
entry.content:
This is the start of a practical blog focused on edge intelligence, robotics, and the systems thinking behind reliable products.

In upcoming posts, I will share:

  • Design patterns for embedded AI deployments
  • Lessons learned from robotics research and product engineering
  • Practical tooling for sensors, ML pipelines, and inference optimization

If there is a specific topic you want covered, reach out through the contact section.
entry.summary: A quick hello and what to expect from this blog.
